titleStmt.title: The bow of Jonathan with the flower de Luce in a funeral lamentation committed to the men of Judah : parallelled and applyed to that worthy his compeere Robert Lucy of Charlcote in the county of Warwick, Esquire, lately deceased : in a sermon preached at Charlcote / by Richard Hunt ...
titleStmt.author: Hunt, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
